column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: At around midnight on the 21st of December
column4: a mass brawl broke out at the staff quarters of Xigang casino on Victory Hill. Six people were arrested by the police.------A Chinese  witness said that Chinese casino employees came back from work drunk and forgot to bring  documents to allow them inside.------They were stopped by local security guards
column5: and disputes occurred.------As things heated up
column6: many people from the dormitory buildings No. 1 and the dormitory building No. 3 rushed downstairs and got involved------The police then rushed to the scene and took away 6 people to the police station for questioning.------Chinese Source – Thanks to J
